title: New: Cut Copy – In These Arms Of Love
body:
I’ve been listening to _In These Arms Of Love_, the new single by Australia’s **Cut Copy** on and off for a week or so now, but today the track has really come into it’s own.

Today is one of the rare days in Glasgow when the sun is shining and everyone descends onto the streets and into the parks, cider in hand and t-shirts by their sides. This is truly cinematic, widescreen pop, built for days like today. Roll down your windows and blast this track while the sun lasts and drift into longing for the festival season thats right around the corner…

_In These Arms Of Love_ is out today and is limited to just 2000 copies.

**\[soundcloud url=”https://api.soundcloud.com/tracks/141799527″ params=”auto\_play=false&hide\_related=false&visual=true” width=”100%” height=”450″ iframe=”true” /\]**
